Elixir is not Ruby, it is better

Sep 23, 2017 RailsClub Moscow, Russia

When speaking about elixir among ruby developers you have to understand the main idea: these languages are not the same.

Even if the syntax looks familiar. They are completely different. And I have shown that elixir solves a lot of the problems we have in ruby.
